ApplicationSubmissionInfoGrp.FormAndInfoAndMaterialsTxt: THE ORGANIZATION'S $10,000 MICRO GRANT PROVIDES SMALL AMOUNTS OF FUNDING TO ENTREPRENEURS WHO ARE TESTING A BIG, NEW BUSINESS IDEA. THROUGH SMALL, PROJECT-BASED GRANTS, THE ORGANIZATION GRANTS MICRO AWARDS FUNDING UP TO $10,000 TO YOUNG COMPANIES LOOKING TO VALIDATE AND ADVANCE THEIR IDEA. MANAGEMENT HAS FOUND THAT FUNDING, PAIRED WITH MENTORSHIP AND GUIDANCE, EARLY IN A COMPANY'S LIFECYCLE, CAN MAKE A SIGNIFICANT IMPACT ON FUTURE SUCCESS. WHEN EVALUATING EACH APPLICATION, NC IDEA WILL MAKE AN ASSESSMENT OF THE STRENGTHS AND WEAKNESSES OF EACH APPLICANT COMPANY IN THE FOLLOWING AREAS: IDEA, TECHNOLOGY, TEAM, MARKET, COMPETITION, STRATEGY, FUNDING, AND IMPACT. ADDITIONAL DETAILS ON THE EVALUATION CRITERIA CAN BE FOUND HERE: HTTPS://NCIDEA.ORG/NC-IDEA-MICRO/
ApplicationSubmissionInfoGrp.SubmissionDeadlinesTxt: ADDITIONAL DETAILS ON THE SUBMISSION TIMELINE CAN BE FOUND AT: HTTPS://NCIDEA.ORG/NC-IDEA-MICRO/
ApplicationSubmissionInfoGrp.RestrictionsOnAwardsTxt: FOR MICRO GRANTS, NC IDEA'S EVALUATION PROCESS IS RIGOROUS AND COMPETITIVE. COMPANIES MUST MEET CRITERIA RELATED TO GEOGRAPHY, INDUSTRY, STAGE OF DEVELOPMENT, TEAM, MARKET OPPORTUNITY, AND PRIOR AND FUTURE INVESTMENT IN ORDER TO BE CONSIDERED. ADDITIONAL DETAILS REGARDING ELIGIBILITY CAN BE FOUND AT: HTTPS://NCIDEA.ORG/NC-IDEA-MICRO/ SUBMISSION DEADLINES: NC IDEA'S MICRO GRANT PROGRAM HAS TWO GRANT CYCLES EACH YEAR. OUR SPRING GRANT CYCLE TYPICALLY OPENS IN MID-FEBRUARY, WHILE OUR FALL GRANT CYCLE OPENS SOMETIME BETWEEN MID-AUGUST AND EARLY SEPTEMBER.

RecipientUSAddress.AddressLine1Txt: 411 W CHAPEL HILL STREET SUITE C2

ApplicationSubmissionInfoGrp.FormAndInfoAndMaterialsTxt: THE ORGANIZATION'S $50,000 SEED GRANT OFFERS EARLY STAGE COMPANIES THE CRITICAL FUNDING, THEY NEED TO SCALE FASTER. NC IDEA SEED GRANTS ARE AWARDED TO INNOVATIVE STARTUPS WITH A PROVEN CONCEPT, EVEN IF THEY ARE NOT YET PROFITABLE. THE FUNDS, ALONG WITH MENTORSHIP AND GUIDANCE, PUSH COMPANIES FORWARD AND REDUCE RISK ASSOCIATED WITH GROWING STARTUPS. WHEN EVALUATING EACH APPLICATION, NC IDEA WILL MAKE AN ASSESSMENT OF THE STRENGTHS AND WEAKNESSES OF EACH APPLICANT COMPANY IN THE FOLLOWING AREAS: IDEA, TECHNOLOGY, TEAM, MARKET, COMPETITION, STRATEGY, FUNDING, AND IMPACT. FOR THE SEED GRANTS, FUNDING IS DONE IN TRANCHES BASED UPON COMPLETION OF TARGETED MILESTONES AND THEREFORE, MAY OR MAY NOT ULTIMATELY BE PAID OUT AT THE FULL POTENTIAL VALUE OF THE GRANT AWARD DEPENDING UPON THE PERFORMANCE OF THE RECIPIENT.
ApplicationSubmissionInfoGrp.SubmissionDeadlinesTxt: ADDITIONAL DETAILS ON THE SUBMISSION TIMELINE CAN BE FOUND AT: HTTPS://NCIDEA.ORG/NC-IDEA-SEED/
ApplicationSubmissionInfoGrp.RestrictionsOnAwardsTxt: FOR SEED GRANTS, NC IDEA'S EVALUATION PROCESS IS RIGOROUS AND COMPETITIVE. COMPANIES MUST MEET CRITERIA RELATED TO GEOGRAPHY, INDUSTRY, STAGE OF DEVELOPMENT, TEAM, MARKET OPPORTUNITY, AND PRIOR AND FUTURE INVESTMENT IN ORDER TO BE CONSIDERED. ADDITIONAL DETAILS REGARDING ELIGIBILITY CAN BE FOUND AT: HTTPS://NCIDEA.ORG/NC-IDEA-SEED/ SUBMISSION DEADLINES: NC IDEA'S SEED GRANT PROGRAM HAS TWO GRANT CYCLES EACH YEAR. OUR SPRING GRANT CYCLE TYPICALLY OPENS IN MID-FEBRUARY, WHILE OUR FALL GRANT CYCLE OPENS SOMETIME BETWEEN MID-AUGUST AND EARLY SEPTEMBER.

RecipientUSAddress.AddressLine1Txt: 411 W CHAPEL HILL STREET SUITE C2

ApplicationSubmissionInfoGrp.FormAndInfoAndMaterialsTxt: THE ORGANIZATION'S ENGAGE GRANT PROGRAM SUPPORTS INDIVIDUALS AND ORGANIZATIONS BY HELPING THEM OFFER PROGRAMS, ORGANIZE EVENTS, AND FACILITATE ACTIVITY THAT BRINGS LIKE-MINDED FOLKS TOGETHER TO CELEBRATE AND PROMOTE ENTREPRENEURSHIP. THROUGH NC IDEA ENGAGE, THE ORGANIZATION HELPS ENTREPRENEURSHIP ADVOCATES OFFER PROGRAMS, PILOT NEW INITIATIVES AND ORGANIZE VIRTUAL AND IN-PERSON EVENTS THAT BRING PEOPLE TOGETHER TO SUPPORT ENTREPRENEURIAL ACTIVITY. THE ORGANIZATION BELIEVES THAT ENTREPRENEURIAL ECOSYSTEMS AND ECONOMICALLY STRONG AND DIVERSE COMMUNITIES GO HAND IN HAND. WHEN EVALUATING EACH APPLICATION, NC IDEA WILL MAKE AN ASSESSMENT OF THE STRENGTHS AND WEAKNESSES OF EACH APPLICATION BASED ON WHETHER THE ACTIVITIES WILL PROMOTE ENTREPRENEURSHIP IN NORTH CAROLINA AS THE PRIMARY GOAL. SUBMISSION DEADLINES: NC IDEA'S ENGAGE GRANT PROGRAM HAS A ROLLING AWARD DATE, BASED ON SUBMISSION OF APPLICATION, WHICH NEED TO BE SUBMITTED NO LESS THAN 60 DAYS PRIOR TO THE PROPOSED ACTIVITY.
ApplicationSubmissionInfoGrp.SubmissionDeadlinesTxt: ADDITIONAL INFO ON SUBMISSION DEADLINES CAN BE FOUND HERE: HTTPS://NCIDEA.ORG/NC-IDEA-ENGAGE/
ApplicationSubmissionInfoGrp.RestrictionsOnAwardsTxt: FOR ENGAGE GRANTS, GRANTEES MUST OFFER PROGRAMS, ORGANIZE EVENTS, AND FACILITATE ACTIVITY THAT BRINGS LIKE-MINDED FOLKS TOGETHER TO CELEBRATE AND PROMOTE ENTREPRENEURSHIP IN NORTH CAROLINA. ADDITIONAL DETAILS REGARDING ELIGIBILITY CAN BE FOUND AT: HTTPS://NCIDEA.ORG/NC-IDEA-ENGAGE/ SUBMISSION DEADLINES: NC IDEA'S ENGAGE GRANT PROGRAM APPLICATION CYCLE IS ON AN ONGOING BASIS.

RecipientUSAddress.AddressLine1Txt: 411 W CHAPEL HILL STREET SUITE C2

ApplicationSubmissionInfoGrp.FormAndInfoAndMaterialsTxt: THE ORGANIZATION'S ECOSYSTEM GRANT PROGRAM FUNDS ORGANIZATIONS ACROSS THE STATE OF NORTH CAROLINA THAT EXECUTE CREATIVE PROGRAMS TO SUPPORT ENTREPRENEURS AND STRENGTHEN NORTH CAROLINA AS A NATIONAL EXEMPLAR FOR ENTREPRENEURSHIP. WHEN EVALUATING EACH APPLICATION, NC IDEA WILL MAKE AN ASSESSMENT OF THE STRENGTHS AND WEAKNESSES OF EACH APPLICATION BASED ON THE ORGANIZATION'S ABILITY AND DESIRE TO EXECUTE ON INNOVATIVE AND TRANSFORMATIONAL IDEAS THAT CAN STRENGTHEN NORTH CAROLINA'S ENTREPRENEURIAL ECOSYSTEM. FOR THE ECOSYSTEM GRANTS, FUNDING IS DONE IN TRANCHES BASED UPON COMPLETION OF TARGETED MILESTONES AND THEREFORE, MAY OR MAY NOT ULTIMATELY BE PAID OUT AT THE FULL POTENTIAL VALUE OF THE GRANT AWARD DEPENDING UPON THE PERFORMANCE OF THE RECIPIENT. ADDITIONAL PROGRAM DETAILS AND ELIGIBILITY DETAILS CAN BE FOUND HERE: HTTPS://NCIDEA.ORG/NC-IDEA-ECOSYSTEM/ SUBMISSION DEADLINES: NC IDEA'S ECOSYSTEM GRANT PROGRAM TYPICALLY HAS ONE GRANT REVIEW AND AWARD CYCLE EVERY SECOND YEAR.
ApplicationSubmissionInfoGrp.SubmissionDeadlinesTxt: ADDITIONAL DETAILS ON THE SUBMISSION TIMELINE CAN BE FOUND AT: HTTPS://NCIDEA.ORG/NC-IDEA-ECOSYSTEM/
ApplicationSubmissionInfoGrp.RestrictionsOnAwardsTxt: FOR ECOSYSTEM GRANTS, GRANTEES MUST BE EITHER NONPROFIT OR FOR-PROFIT ORGANIZATIONS WITHIN NORTH CAROLINA THAT PRIMARILY HELP PEOPLE START AND GROW HIGH POTENTIAL FIRMS. ADDITIONAL DETAILS REGARDING ELIGIBILITY CAN BE FOUND AT: HTTPS://NCIDEA.ORG/NC-IDEA-ECOSYSTEM/ SUBMISSION DEADLINES: NC IDEA'S ECOSYSTEMS GRANT PROGRAM HAS TWO GRANT CYCLES EACH YEAR. OUR SPRING GRANT CYCLE TYPICALLY OPENS IN MID-FEBRUARY, WHILE OUR FALL GRANT CYCLE OPENS SOMETIME BETWEEN MID-AUGUST AND EARLY SEPTEMBER.

RecipientUSAddress.AddressLine1Txt: 411 W CHAPEL HILL STREET SUITE C2

ApplicationSubmissionInfoGrp.FormAndInfoAndMaterialsTxt: THE ORGANIZATION'S MINDSET GRANT PROGRAM [SOMETIMES CALLED THE ICE HOUSE GRANT PROGRAM] FUNDS PARTICIPANTS IN THE FUNDAMENTAL ASPECTS OF ENTREPRENEURIAL THINKING WHILE IMMERSING THEM IN THE PROCESS THAT WILL ENABLE THEM TO DEVELOP ENTREPRENEURIAL SKILLS. NC IDEA MINDSET IS DESIGNED TO DEVELOP CREATIVITY AND CRITICAL THINKING, EFFECTIVE PROBLEM SOLVING, TEAMWORK AND OTHER ENTREPRENEURIAL SKILLS ENABLING INDIVIDUALS TO SUCCEED REGARDLESS OF THEIR CHOSEN PATH. THROUGH DEPLOYMENT OF THE PROGRAM ALONGSIDE STATEWIDE EDUCATION PARTNERS, THE ORGANIZATION WANTS TO BRING THE POWER OF ENTREPRENEURIAL THINKING TO 100,000 NORTH CAROLINIANS BY 2025.
ApplicationSubmissionInfoGrp.RestrictionsOnAwardsTxt: THE ORGANIZATION OFFERS MINDSET FACILITATOR TRAINING TO INDIVIDUALS FROM SELECTED ORGANIZATIONS ON AN OCCASIONAL BASIS. THESE ORGANIZATIONS ARE DRAWN FROM EDUCATIONAL INSTITUTIONS (PARTICULARLY COMMUNITY COLLEGES), ENTREPRENEURIAL SUPPORT ORGANIZATIONS, ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT ORGANIZATIONS, LIBRARIES, CDFIS, GOVERNMENT ENTITIES OR OTHER ENTREPRENEURIALLY MINDED ENTITIES. ELIGIBILITY DETAILS REGARDING HOW TO BECOME A MINDSET PARTNER CAN BE FOUND HERE: HTTPS://NCIDEA.ORG/NC-IDEA-MINDSET/
